channel.title: How to edit the client at the top plz help me!
channel.description:
ok i got a cleint i found out how to edit the background now i need to know how to edit it saying at the top pk-till-die v1 but it says vintage scape v3 plz i would appreciate it if you could help me, also im going to post my server but wheni did the ip is one of those things where u ahve to go to gui.java to change but i want it so when ppl run my client the ip is my one and you cannot change it please help
thx

item.title: How to edit the client at the top plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Ya. So look for “vintage scape v3” and change it to “PK-Till-Die v1”.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the client at the top plz help me!

item.title: How to edit the client at the top plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I’m guessing you mean the caption? Try checking Gui.java, or Client.java. If not there, Applet_Sub1.java.

Read full topic
